description: Detects potential process patterns related to Cobalt Strike beacon activity
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potential CobaltStrike Process Patterns
query: (((process.command_line.text:"*cmd.exe\ \/C\ whoami" AND process.parent.executable.text:"C\:\\Temp\\*")) OR ((process.parent.executable.text:("*\\runonce.exe" OR "*\\dllhost.exe") AND process.command_line.text:"*cmd.exe\ \/c\ echo*" AND process.command_line.text:"*>\ \\\\.\\pipe*")) OR ((process.parent.command_line.text:"*cmd.exe\ \/C\ echo*" AND process.parent.command_line.text:"*\ >\ \\\\.\\pipe*" AND process.command_line.text:"*conhost.exe\ 0xffffffff\ \-ForceV1")) OR ((process.parent.command_line.text:"*\/C\ whoami" AND process.command_line.text:"*conhost.exe\ 0xffffffff\ \-ForceV1")))
